titles.title: A resolution expressing support for the designation of May 2021 as "Motorcycle Safety Awareness Month".
A resolution expressing support for the designation of May 2021 as "Motorcycle Safety Awareness Month".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: This resolution (1) expresses support for the designation of May 2021 as Motorcycle Safety Awareness Month; (2) recognizes the contribution of motorcycles to the transportation mix; (3) encourages motorcycle awareness by all road users; (4) recognizes that motorcyclists have a right to the road and that all motorists should safely share the roadways; (5) encourages rider safety education, training, and proper gear for safe motorcycle operation; and (6) supports the goals of Motorcycle Safety Awareness Month.
